ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ismri2.1 | |- N = ( mrCls ` A ) |
| 2 |  | ismri2.2 | |- I = ( mrInd ` A ) |
| 3 |  | ismri2d.3 | |- ( ph -> A e. ( Moore ` X ) ) |
| 4 |  | ismri2d.4 | |- ( ph -> S C_ X ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_ismri2 | |- ( ( A e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ S C_ X ) -> ( S e. I <-> A. x e. S -. x e. ( N ` ( S \ { x } ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( S e. I <-> A. x e. S -. x e. ( N ` ( S \ { x } ) ) ) ) |
